name: Potion of Poison
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Specific Cursed Items/Potion of Poison

sections.body: This potion has lost its beneficial abilities and become a potent poison. This poison deals 1d3 Constitution damage per round for 6 rounds. A poisoned creature can make a DC 14 Fortitude save each round to negate the damage and end the affliction.
